subject: Baseball
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: The 20-year-old slugger, the first openly gay player affiliated with Major League Baseball, struggled with a Class A Brewers affiliate, yet he has shown flashes.
snippet: The 20-year-old slugger, the first openly gay player affiliated with Major League Baseball, struggled with a Class A Brewers affiliate, yet he has shown flashes.
